name: Just A Dream
description:
PLEASE NOTE that all screenshots / the trailer are not up to date with the current version and will be updated prior release

Just a Dream is a fast paced top down action game. You enter a world filled with your worst nightmares and must escape. As you fight across your dream from level to level, you encounter the very things that you dread every night. Pick up unique weapons and use magical abilities that allow you to traverse the lands of nightmares and monsters to conquer Anxiety, Fear, and Despair themselves. Your adventure starts as you must escape back into the realms of reality.

  • 36 unique abilities with thousands of unique combinations
  • 4 different environments, all ending with an intense boss fight, integrated with a unique musical theme for each
  • Randomly generated levels to ensure one never has the same experience
  • Many weapons from the Assault King to the Salt Shotgun
  • Unlock abilities easily and cosmetics for the more adventurous to prove their prowess

All assets were created by our team and a few helpers.
